page.title: 14Andoversford - Resident M(2)
page.content: The cottages on Sandywell Estate were all built for the railway workers. Andoversford was created a Parish in 1952.There are now over 200 houses.A school was built in 1928.The Post Office always used to be on the farm but it was then moved to Station Road. Two estates have been built-Hunters Way and Crossfields.The shops and dwelling houses were built between the market and Hunters Way. Twenty four more dwelling houses have been built in the lower part of the village. What used to be a playing field to Mr.Finch is now a first class village hall which is fully equiped for all events.
